Spanish: Fuerte ataque a la base estadounidense

English: Everyone, defend the base! We're under heavy fire!
French: À tous, défendez la base ! On reçoit des tirs intenses !
Spanish: ¡Todo el mundo a defender la base! ¡Sufrimos un fuerte ataque!
Italian: Difendete la base! Siamo sotto attacco pesante!

English: Golf to Crossroad, we can't hold out much longer! We request reinforcements! Over.
French: Golf à Crossroad, on ne va plus tenir longtemps ! Demandons des renforts, à vous !
Spanish: Golf a Crossroad, ¡no podemos aguantar mucho más! ¡Necesitamos refuerzos! Cambio.
Italian: Golf a Crossroad, non possiamo resistere per molto! Ci servono rinforzi! Passo.

English: Crossroad to Golf, bravo team is ready near the city of Paraiso. However at the moment we have no available transport for them. Over.
French: Crossroad à Golf, l'équipe Bravo est prête près de la ville de Paraiso, mais nous n'avons pour l'instant pas de quoi la transporter, à vous.
Spanish: Crossroad a Golf, el pelotón Bravo está listo cerca de la ciudad de Paraísom, pero aún no tienen medio de transporte. Cambio.
Italian: Crossroad a Golf, la squadra Bravo è vicina alla città di Paraiso, ma al momento non abbiamo mezzi di trasporto disponibili. Passo.

English: Golf to Crossroad, we're sending a truck for them. Inform the Bravo team. Over.
French: Golf à Crossroad, on lui envoie un camion. Informez l'équipe Bravo, à vous.
Spanish: Golf a Crossroad, les enviamos un camión. Informad al pelotón Bravo. Cambio.
Italian: Golf a Crossroad, un veicolo sta andando a prenderli. Informateli. Passo.

English: Bravo to Foxtrot, we're all on board. Let's go!
French: Bravo à Foxtrot, on est tous à bord. En route !
Spanish: Bravo a Foxtrot, ya hemos montado. ¡En marcha!
Italian: Bravo a Foxtrot, siamo a bordo. Andiamo!

English: Golf to Foxtrot, where are you? We can't hold on much longer. Over. You have 4 minutes soldier, then we will have to leave our positions in the base.
French: Golf à Foxtrot, où êtes-vous ? On ne peut plus tenir, à vous. Vous avez 4 minutes, soldat. Ensuite, on devra abandonner nos positions dans la base.
Spanish: Golf a Foxtrot, ¿dónde estáis? No podemos aguantar mucho más. Cambio. Sodado, tienes 4 minutos antes de que tengamos que abandonar nuestras posiciones en la base.
Italian: Golf a Foxtrot, dove siete? Non possiamo resistere a lungo. Passo. Soldati, avete 4 minuti, poi dovremo lasciare le nostre posizioni nella base.

English: Hold still, Captain. I'm on my way. I think I can make it!
French: Tenez bon, capitaine. Je suis en route. Je crois que je peux y arriver.
Spanish: Aguanta, capitán. Voy de camino. ¡Creo que lo conseguiré!
Italian: Resistete, capitano. Sto arrivando! Ce la posso fare!

English: Sorry, Sir. I'm unable to make it in time.
French: Désolé, je ne serai pas là à temps.
Spanish: Lo siento, señor. No llego a tiempo.
Italian: Mi dispiace, signore. Non ce la faccio.

English: Golf to Foxtrot, move to Airport base. We're leaving our positions.
French: Golf à Foxtrot, rejoignez la base de l'aéroport. On quitte nos positions.
Spanish: Golf a Foxtrot, id a la base del aeropuerto, abandonamos posiciones.
Italian: Golf a Foxtrot, muovetevi verso l’aeroporto. Stiamo abbandonando le posizioni.
